featured_work.title: CXAS: Finegrained Anatomy Segmentation in Chest-Radiographs
featured_work.description: The interpretation of chest radiographs (CXR) remains a challenge due to ambiguous overlapping structures such as the lungs, heart, and bones hindering the annotation. To address this, we propose a novel method for extracting fine-grained anatomical structures in CXR using pseudo-labeling of three-dimensional computer tomography (CTs).
